name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
本課程將介紹西方文學和文化的主要作家、流派、時期和思想。
This course will provide an introduction to the major writers, genres, periods, and ideas in Western literature and culture.
schedule:
Week 1:  Introduction
	
2-5:  Unit 1 – Foundational Texts (Myths, Biblical Stories)

6-8:  Unit 2 – Periods (Classical / Medieval / Modern)
	and Genres (fiction / drama / lyrics) of Literature

9:  Midterm week

10-13:  Unit 3 – Essential Ideas in Western Culture (self / society / love / death) 

14-17:  Unit 4 – Classic Texts and Popular Culture
	
18:  Finals week
